#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <climits>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <list>
#include <queue>
#include <deque>
#include <stack>
#include <set>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <bitset>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define vt vector

pair<ll,ll> sieve[100010];

int main()
{
	for(ll i=0;i<=100000;i++)
		sieve[i].first=1,sieve[i].second=i;
	for(ll i=2;i<=100000;i++)
		if(sieve[i].first==1)
			for(ll j=i;j<=100000;j+=i)
				sieve[j].first *= i;
	sort(sieve+1,sieve+100000+1);
	ll t,n,k;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	ll prev=0;
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&k);
		ll i=0;
		ll c=0;
		while(c<k)
		{
			i++;
			if(sieve[i].second<=n)
				c++;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",sieve[i].second);
		prev=n;
	}
	return 0;
}
